title: Contego Encryption
description:
Welcome To Contego Soft!

Contego Encryption is a file or folder encryption,decryption software used by those who wish to protect there information from hackers or online threats. This software uses todays standard in cryptography and utilizes only the best algorithms.

Please note this software is as is with no warrantee or guarantee, Contego Soft is not responsible for any loss or damage to your file system or computer by using this product you agree to not redistribute this or any part of this software without proper consent from its creators.

Program Usage

-Encryption and Decryption of files or folders with added password protection
-File Zip Utility With AES256 Encryption, Password Protection
-Filename Encryption and Decryption
-System Restore
-Program Lock Feature

For maximum protection it is possible to first Encrypt your files also adding a password then using the zip utility you can Encrypt with AES265 algorithm and set an additional password and encrypt your filenames making it unreadable and inaccessible to others.
